title: Does the Human Eye "See" in FPS?
description: WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS THROUGHOUT VIDEO. THOSE PRONE TO SEIZURES SHOULD NOT WATCH.  - REVISITED! Here's to the misconception regarding the human eye and frame rates. Here's to those who game at well over 60 FPS. Here's to the console fanatics who insist that 30 FPS is "good enough." Here's to the science (AFAWK).
